'''MINECON Earth 2017 Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Mcnet|free-minecon-stuff-marketplace|Free MINECON stuff on Marketplace!|November 13, 2017|Marsh Davies}}</ref> is a celebratory [[skin pack]] for [[MINECON Earth 2017]] that includes 8 skins themed around MINECON. In addition to the skin pack's release on the storefronts of ''[[Bedrock Edition]]'' and [[Legacy Console Edition]], a ZIP archive containing the skins for ''[[Java Edition]]'' was available on [[Minecraft.net]].<ref>{{Cite|url=https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/slip-some-minecon-skins|title=Slip on some MINECON skins!|website=Minecraft.net}}</ref>
